trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hamilton Township
There were no other sightings in Hamilton Township on or around October 4th 2012
divs: sighting detailswas driving home. driving on 295 south from mercerville\hamilton. when i noticed a purple\bluish light over where 295 crosses over 195. it first appeard as a spec of light but caught my attention because of the color of it. it was coming toward me going north on 295 as i was going south. finally meeting it right over me at around mercerville\whitehorse rd. when i looked as it passed me it appeared to look like a bluish color. like you would see on a cutting torch. i saw no marker lights and it made no sound. i would estimate it to be 500 to 1000 feet high and 7 to 15 feet across. the object went in a straight line along 295 north until it got to mercerville\whitehorse road and disappeared from site going towards hamilton.
Summary: {dr}saw object from 295 south/195 going North on 295 fly over mercerville/whithorse rd.
